reviewText: THe book is terrific but the movie feels like a not well done telenovela, every scene is about a dramatic cry. Feels like a movie for little kids. THe story is in itself a lesson but the movie is not. Good photography but as a movie it looks like a the pieces of a one year telenovela cut in pieces. THere are better Chilean movies, this is not one of them.
This movie is a masterpiece of the Chilean cinema, recommendable not only for the deeply impressing performances of the actors but also for an excellent script and direction !

This is one of the best chileans movies I ever seen,  winner of four awards .This is a two disc movie based on a small city in Chile, Pueblo de Lota in 1897. One of the biggest coal mines of the world ,This movie is based on a book by Baldomero Lillo, you can not missed it, is one of the best!!!!! great acting,well everything is GREAT!!!!!!enjoy it
